eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).

(Nk D van der Walt) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye Nezindaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho)

eng: APPENDIXES
zul: IZITHASISELO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
zul: IZIKHALAZO EZIBHEKISWE EMAKOMIDINI

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini woMasipala Omkhulu wase-Ekurhuleni ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye mayelana nokuthuthwa okungahambi kahle kukadoti okuhlala kwenzeka endaweni yawo (Mnu H Ismail) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye Nezindaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseKokomeng kanye nasezigodini ezingomakhelwane, ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye futhi sibeke phambili ukuvulwa kabusha kwesiteshi samaphoyisa saseKokomeng (Mnu I S Seitlholo) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezamaphoyisa – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
zul: Isikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseBredell, ePomona, Berentwood Park kanye naseGlen Marais (esigcemeni sa-25), iDolobhakazi lase-Ekurhuleni, ucela iSishayamthetho ukuthi siphenye ngokufadabala kokuhlinzekwa okuthembekayo kogesi ezindaweni zawo (Nksz H Ismail) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye neziNdaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini wase-Actonville, eBenoni, ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye izinga mayelana nokumba eqolo kokuqasha izindlu abaqashi bamafulethi angawomkhandlu (Nks H Ismail)- (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuHlaliswa kwabantu, Amanzi Kanye nokuthuthwa kwendle-  iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseJamestown, Stellenbosch, ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye mayelana negunya lokwengamela ugesi eJamestown, Eskom alinikeze uMasipala waseStellenbosch (Dkt L Shreiber) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele izinkampani zikahulumeni -  isiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseGermiston, uMasipala omkhulu wase-Ekurhuleni ucela isiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke ukuthi siphenye mayelana nokunqamuka kwamandla kagesi okuningana (Nk Clarke) – ((IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele izinkampani zikahulumen - isiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseLetsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, ucela ukuthi isiShayamthetho siqinisekise ukuthi umasipala waseTzaneen uyayigcina imithetho kanye nezimiso zomasipala, nokuthi isebenzisa ukwehlukaniswa kwemingcele okbekiwe okuhambisana nendawo, kanye nokuqapha futhi imise yonke imisebenzi engekho emthethweniand that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning,  (Nk D van der Walt) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye Nezindaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
zul: 8.Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela kubalimi kanye nomphakathini waseTzaneen, eLimpopo, omelwe uAGRI Letaba, ucela ukuthi isiShayamthetho siphenye ukunqamuka kwamandla kagesi okudlangile, amandla kagesi amancane, amavoltheji aphansi kanye nokulungiswa okungekuhle noma okungenzeki nhlobo. (Nk D van der Walt) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye Nezindaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho)

eng: APPENDIXES
zul: IZITHASISELO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
zul: IZIKHALAZO EZIBHEKISWE EMAKOMIDINI

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini woMasipala Omkhulu wase-Ekurhuleni ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye mayelana nokuthuthwa okungahambi kahle kukadoti okuhlala kwenzeka endaweni yawo (Mnu H Ismail) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye Nezindaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseKokomeng kanye nasezigodini ezingomakhelwane, ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye futhi sibeke phambili ukuvulwa kabusha kwesiteshi samaphoyisa saseKokomeng (Mnu I S Seitlholo) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezamaphoyisa – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
zul: Isikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseBredell, ePomona, Berentwood Park kanye naseGlen Marais (esigcemeni sa-25), iDolobhakazi lase-Ekurhuleni, ucela iSishayamthetho ukuthi siphenye ngokufadabala kokuhlinzekwa okuthembekayo kogesi ezindaweni zawo (Nksz H Ismail) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye neziNdaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini wase-Actonville, eBenoni, ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye izinga mayelana nokumba eqolo kokuqasha izindlu abaqashi bamafulethi angawomkhandlu (Nks H Ismail)- (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuHlaliswa kwabantu, Amanzi Kanye nokuthuthwa kwendle-  iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseGermiston, uMasipala omkhulu wase-Ekurhuleni ucela isiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke ukuthi siphenye mayelana nokunqamuka kwamandla kagesi okuningana (Nk Clarke) – ((IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele izinkampani zikahulumen - isiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseLetsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, ucela ukuthi isiShayamthetho siqinisekise ukuthi umasipala waseTzaneen uyayigcina imithetho kanye nezimiso zomasipala, nokuthi isebenzisa ukwehlukaniswa kwemingcele okbekiwe okuhambisana nendawo, kanye nokuqapha futhi imise yonke imisebenzi engekho emthethweniand that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning,  (Nk D van der Walt) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye Nezindaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela kubalimi kanye nomphakathini waseTzaneen, eLimpopo, omelwe uAGRI Letaba, ucela ukuthi isiShayamthetho siphenye ukunqamuka kwamandla kagesi okudlangile, amandla kagesi amancane, amavoltheji aphansi kanye nokulungiswa okungekuhle noma okungenzeki nhlobo. (Nk D van der Walt) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye Nezindaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho)

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini woMasipala Omkhulu wase-Ekurhuleni ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye mayelana nokuthuthwa okungahambi kahle kukadoti okuhlala kwenzeka endaweni yawo (Mnu H Ismail) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye Nezindaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseKokomeng kanye nasezigodini ezingomakhelwane, ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye futhi sibeke phambili ukuvulwa kabusha kwesiteshi samaphoyisa saseKokomeng (Mnu I S Seitlholo) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezamaphoyisa – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
zul: Isikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseBredell, ePomona, Berentwood Park kanye naseGlen Marais (esigcemeni sa-25), iDolobhakazi lase-Ekurhuleni, ucela iSishayamthetho ukuthi siphenye ngokufadabala kokuhlinzekwa okuthembekayo kogesi ezindaweni zawo (Nksz H Ismail) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye neziNdaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini wase-Actonville, eBenoni, ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye izinga mayelana nokumba eqolo kokuqasha izindlu abaqashi bamafulethi angawomkhandlu (Nks H Ismail)- (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuHlaliswa kwabantu, Amanzi Kanye nokuthuthwa kwendle-  iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseJamestown, Stellenbosch, ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye mayelana negunya lokwengamela ugesi eJamestown, Eskom alinikeze uMasipala waseStellenbosch (Dkt L Shreiber) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele izinkampani zikahulumeni -  isiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseGermiston, uMasipala omkhulu wase-Ekurhuleni ucela isiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke ukuthi siphenye mayelana nokunqamuka kwamandla kagesi okuningana (Nk Clarke) – ((IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele izinkampani zikahulumen - isiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseLetsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, ucela ukuthi isiShayamthetho siqinisekise ukuthi umasipala waseTzaneen uyayigcina imithetho kanye nezimiso zomasipala, nokuthi isebenzisa ukwehlukaniswa kwemingcele okbekiwe okuhambisana nendawo, kanye nokuqapha futhi imise yonke imisebenzi engekho emthethweniand that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning,  (Nk D van der Walt) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye Nezindaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
zul: 8.Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela kubalimi kanye nomphakathini waseTzaneen, eLimpopo, omelwe uAGRI Letaba, ucela ukuthi isiShayamthetho siphenye ukunqamuka kwamandla kagesi okudlangile, amandla kagesi amancane, amavoltheji aphansi kanye nokulungiswa okungekuhle noma okungenzeki nhlobo. (Nk D van der Walt) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye Nezindaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho)

zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseKokomeng kanye nasezigodini ezingomakhelwane, ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye futhi sibeke phambili ukuvulwa kabusha kwesiteshi samaphoyisa saseKokomeng (Mnu I S Seitlholo) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezamaphoyisa – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
zul: Isikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseBredell, ePomona, Berentwood Park kanye naseGlen Marais (esigcemeni sa-25), iDolobhakazi lase-Ekurhuleni, ucela iSishayamthetho ukuthi siphenye ngokufadabala kokuhlinzekwa okuthembekayo kogesi ezindaweni zawo (Nksz H Ismail) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye neziNdaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini wase-Actonville, eBenoni, ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye izinga mayelana nokumba eqolo kokuqasha izindlu abaqashi bamafulethi angawomkhandlu (Nks H Ismail)- (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuHlaliswa kwabantu, Amanzi Kanye nokuthuthwa kwendle-  iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseGermiston, uMasipala omkhulu wase-Ekurhuleni ucela isiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke ukuthi siphenye mayelana nokunqamuka kwamandla kagesi okuningana (Nk Clarke) – ((IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele izinkampani zikahulumen - isiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseLetsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, ucela ukuthi isiShayamthetho siqinisekise ukuthi umasipala waseTzaneen uyayigcina imithetho kanye nezimiso zomasipala, nokuthi isebenzisa ukwehlukaniswa kwemingcele okbekiwe okuhambisana nendawo, kanye nokuqapha futhi imise yonke imisebenzi engekho emthethweniand that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning,  (Nk D van der Walt) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye Nezindaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
zul: 1.Ukuqiniswa kwesivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNdiya, uhulumeni Wobufederali weRiphabhuliki yaseBrazil kanye noHulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika mayelana neSikhwama se-IBSA Sokwehlisa izinga lobumpofu kanye Nendlala (Esasayindwa mhlazi-17 kuMfumfu wezi-2017) (Esethulwe mhlazi-18 kuMfumfu wezi-2019) (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Okuthunyelwe eKomidini elibhekele Ezobudlelwano Bamazwe Omhlaba Nokubambisana mhlazinga-22 kuMfumfu wezi-2019). (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esaqondiswa eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezokuphepha kanye neZobulungiswa mhlazingama-24 kuMfumfu wezi-).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
zul: 2.Isivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye NoMphakathi WaseYurophu Olawula Ukusetshenziswa Kwamandla Enunzi (i-EURATOM) ukuze kuSetshenziswe Amandla Enunzi Ngokubambisana Okunokuthula (Esendlalwe mhlazi-14 kuLwezi wezi-2019) (Esithunyelwe eKomidini LeSishayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezezimbiwa Nezamandla mhlaziyi-18 kuLwezi wezi-2019).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).

eng: MOTIONS:
zul: IZIPHAKAMISO:

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House, notwithstanding Rule 139(1), which deals with questions for oral reply in respect of the Deputy President, permits that replies in respect of oral questions that were due to be given on 20 August 2020, be submitted in writing as agreed by the National Assembly Programme Committee.
zul: Isinqumo somhlangano sesikhashana (USotswebhu omKhulu weQembu eliBusayo): Ukuthi iNdlu, noma kukhona uMthetho 139(1), omayelana nokubuzwa kwemibuzo okufanele iphendulwe uSekela Mongameli ngomlomo, uvumele ukuthi izimpendulo mayelana nemibuzo yomlomo obekumele ibuzwe mhla zingama-20 kuNcwaba wezi-2020, yethulwe ibhalwe phansi njengokuvumelana kweKomidi lezinHlelo lesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke.

eng: Convention establishing the Square Kilometre Array (SKA) Observatory (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 – reported on 8 October 2019 – approved on 6 November 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 - reported on 19 February 2020).
zul: Isivumelwano esasungula i-Square Kilometre Array (SKA) Observatory (Eyathulwamhlaziyi-18 kuMandulo wezi-2019) (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Eyaqondiswa eKomidini LesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezemfundo Ephakeme, iSayensi kanye neZobuchwepheshe mhlazi-19 kuMandulo wezi-2019). (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esidluliselwe eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlazi-19 kuLwezi wezi-2019 2019 – esabikwa mhlazi- 8 kuMfumfu wezi-2019 – esemukelwa mhlaziyi-6 kuLwezi wezi-2019) ((UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esidluliselwe eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlazi-19 kuLwezi wezi-2019 – esibikwe mhlazi-19 kuNhlolanja wezi-2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019).
zul: Isivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika nesikhungo saMazwe Omhlaba esaziwa ngokuthi yi-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) ngokuSungulwa kwengxenye yesikhungo esaziwa ngokuthi i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) eRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika  (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Esindlalelwa iPhalamende mhlaziyi-18 kuMandulo wezi-2019) (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esaqondiswa eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlazi-19 kuMandulo-2019 esabikwa mhlazi-5 kuZibandlela wezi-2019) (UMkandlu kaZwelonke Wezifundazwe: Esidluliselwe eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlazi-19 kuLwezi wezi-2019).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
zul: Ukuqiniswa kwesivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNdiya, uhulumeni Wobufederali weRiphabhuliki yaseBrazil kanye noHulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika mayelana neSikhwama se-IBSA Sokwehlisa izinga lobumpofu kanye Nendlala (Esasayindwa mhlazi-17 kuMfumfu wezi-2017) (Esethulwe mhlazi-18 kuMfumfu wezi-2019) (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Okuthunyelwe eKomidini elibhekele Ezobudlelwano Bamazwe Omhlaba Nokubambisana mhlazinga-22 kuMfumfu wezi-2019). (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esaqondiswa eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezokuphepha kanye neZobulungiswa mhlazinga-24 kuMfumfu wezi-2019).

M Waters) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NoKubambisana kanye Nezindaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
zul: Isikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseBoksburg, uMasipala omkhulu wase-Ekurhuleni, ucela isiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke ukuthi siphenye mayelana nokunqamuka kwamandla kagesi okuningana (uMnu. M Waters) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye neziNdaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

M Waters) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele eZamaphoyisa

eng: Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini wase-Alberton, ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye ngokubamba iqhaza komphakathi kanye nokulandelwa komthetho  kwintuthuko yokwakhiwa kwezindlu okuhlongoziwe e-Alberton (uMnu D Bergman) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye neziNdaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).

zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini woMasipala Omkhulu wase-Ekurhuleni ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye mayelana nokuthuthwa okungahambi kahle kukadoti okuhlala kwenzeka endaweni yawo (uMnu H Ismail) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye Nezindaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Convention establishing the Square Kilometre Array (SKA) Observatory (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 – reported on 8 October 2019 – approved on 6 November 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 - reported on 19 February 2020).
zul: Isivumelwano esasungula i-Square Kilometre Array (SKA) Observatory (Eyathulwamhlaziyi-18 kuMandulo wezi-2019) (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Eyaqondiswa eKomidini LesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezemfundo Ephakeme, iSayensi kanye neZobuchwepheshe mhlazi-19 kuMandulo wezi-2019). (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esidluliselwe eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlazi-19 kuLwezi wezi-2019 2019 – esabikwa mhlazi- 8 kuMfumfu wezi-2019 – esemukelwa mhlaziyi-6 kuLwezi wezi-2019) ((UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esidluliselwe eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlazi-19 kuLwezi wezi-2019 – esibikwe mhlazi-19 kuNhlolanja wezi-2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019).
zul: Isivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika nesikhungo saMazwe Omhlaba esaziwa ngokuthi yi-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) ngokuSungulwa kwengxenye yesikhungo esaziwa ngokuthi i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) eRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika  (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Esindlalelwa iPhalamende mhlaziyi-18 kuMandulo wezi-2019) (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esaqondiswa eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlazi-19 kuMandulo-2019 esabikwa mhlazi-5 kuZibandlela wezi-2019) (UMkandlu kaZwelonke Wezifundazwe: Esidluliselwe eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlazi-19 kuLwezi wezi-2019).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
zul: Ukuqiniswa kwesivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNdiya, uhulumeni Wobufederali weRiphabhuliki yaseBrazil kanye noHulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika mayelana neSikhwama se-IBSA Sokwehlisa izinga lobumpofu kanye Nendlala (Esasayindwa mhlazi-17 kuMfumfu wezi-2017) (Esethulwe mhlazi-18 kuMfumfu wezi-2019) (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Okuthunyelwe eKomidini elibhekele Ezobudlelwano Bamazwe Omhlaba Nokubambisana mhlazinga-22 kuMfumfu wezi-2019). eng: Convention establishing the Square Kilometre Array (SKA) Observatory (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 – reported on 8 October 2019 – approved on 6 November 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 - reported on 19 February 2020).
zul: Isivumelwano esasungula i-Square Kilometre Array (SKA) Observatory (Eyathulwamhlaziyi-18 kuMandulo wezi-2019) (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Eyaqondiswa eKomidini LesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezemfundo Ephakeme, iSayensi kanye neZobuchwepheshe mhlazi-19 kuMandulo wezi-2019). (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esidluliselwe eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlazi-19 kuLwezi wezi-2019 2019 – esabikwa mhlazi- 8 kuMfumfu wezi-2019 – esemukelwa mhlaziyi-6 kuLwezi wezi-2019) ((UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esidluliselwe eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlazi-19 kuLwezi wezi-2019 – esibikwe mhlazi-19 kuNhlolanja wezi-2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019).
zul: Isivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika nesikhungo saMazwe Omhlaba esaziwa ngokuthi yi-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) ngokuSungulwa kwengxenye yesikhungo esaziwa ngokuthi i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) eRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika  (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Esindlalelwa iPhalamende mhlaziyi-18 kuMandulo wezi-2019) (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esaqondiswa eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlazi-19 kuMandulo-2019 esabikwa mhlazi-5 kuZibandlela wezi-2019) (UMkandlu kaZwelonke Wezifundazwe: Esidluliselwe eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlazi-19 kuLwezi wezi-2019).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
zul: Ukuqiniswa kwesivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNdiya, uhulumeni Wobufederali weRiphabhuliki yaseBrazil kanye noHulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika mayelana neSikhwama se-IBSA Sokwehlisa izinga lobumpofu kanye Nendlala (Esasayindwa mhlazi-17 kuMfumfu wezi-2017) (Esethulwe mhlazi-18 kuMfumfu wezi-2019) (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Okuthunyelwe eKomidini elibhekele Ezobudlelwano Bamazwe Omhlaba Nokubambisana mhlazinga-22 kuMfumfu wezi-2019). (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esaqondiswa eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezokuphepha kanye neZobulungiswa mhlazinga-24 kuMfumfu wezi-2019).

eng: MOTIONS:
zul: IZIPHAKAMISO:

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House extends the deadline by which the Ad Hoc Committee to initiate and introduce legislation amending section 25 of the Constitution has to complete its task to 30 May 2020.
zul: Isinqumo sesikhashana somhlangano (USositswebhu oMkhulu WeQembu EliBusayo): Ukuthi iNdlu yelule isikhathi esiwumnqamlajuqu okufanele ukuthi iKomidi Lesikhashana liqale futhi lethule umthetho wokuchibiyela isigaba sa-25 soMthethosisekelo ukuze liqede umsebenzi walo mhlazi-29 kuNhlaba wezi-2020.

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House revives the Aquaculture Development Bill [B 22 - 2018] (National Assembly –sec 76) and resumes proceedings on the Bill from the stage it reached on the last day of the sixth session of the Fifth Parliament.
zul: Isinqumo sesikhashana somhlangano (USositswebhu oMkhulu WeQembu EliBusayo): Ukuthi iNdlu ivuselele uMthethosivivinywa Wokuthuthukiswa Kwemboni Yokukhuliswa Kwezilwane Nezimila Zasemanzini Ngenhloso Yokuthi Zidliwe [B 22 - 2018] (iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke – isigaba sama-76) kanye nokuthi kuqhutshekwe nokusetshenzwa kwaloMthethosivivinywa ukusuka osukwini lokugcina lokuhlala kwesithupha kwePhalamende Lesihlanu.

M Waters) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye neziNdaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Convention establishing the Square Kilometre Array (SKA) Observatory (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 – reported on 8 October 2019 – approved on 6 November 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 - reported on 19 February 2020).
zul: Isivumelwano esasungula i-Square Kilometre Array (SKA) Observatory (Eyathulwamhlaziyi-18 kuMandulo wezi-2019) (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Eyaqondiswa eKomidini LesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezemfundo Ephakeme, iSayensi kanye neZobuchwepheshe mhlazi-19 kuMandulo wezi-2019). (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esidluliselwe eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlazi-19 kuLwezi wezi-2019 2019 – esabikwa mhlaziyi- 8 kuMfumfu wezi-2019 – esemukelwa mhlaziyi-6 kuLwezi wezi-2019) ((UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esidluliselwe eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlaziyi-19 kuLwezi wezi-2019 – esibikwe mhlaziyi-19 kuNhlolanja wezi-2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019).
zul: Isivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika nesikhungo saMazwe Omhlaba esaziwa ngokuthi yi-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) ngokuSungulwa kwengxenye yesikhungo esaziwa ngokuthi i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) eRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika  (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Esindlalelwa iPhalamende mhlaziyi-18 kuMandulo wezi-2019) (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esaqondiswa eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlazi-19 kuMandulo-2019 esabikwa mhlazi-5 kuZibandlela wezi-2019) (UMkandlu kaZwelonke Wezifundazwe: Esidluliselwe eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlaziyi-19 kuLwezi wezi-2019).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
zul: Ukuqiniswa kwesivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNdiya, uhulumeni Wobufederali weRiphabhuliki yaseBrazil kanye noHulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika mayelana neSikhwama se-IBSA Sokwehlisa izinga lobumpofu kanye Nendlala (Esasayindwa mhlazi-17 kuMfumfu wezi-2017) (Esethulwe mhlazi-18 kuMfumfu wezi-2019) (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Okuthunyelwe eKomidini elibhekele Ezobudlelwano Bamazwe Omhlaba Nokubambisana mhlazinga-22 kuMfumfu wezi-2019). (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esaqondiswa eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezokuphepha kanye neZobulungiswa mhlazingama-24 kuMfumfu wezi-2019).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
zul: IZIVUMELWANO ZAMAZWE OMHLABA

eng: Convention establishing the Square Kilometre Array (SKA) Observatory (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 – reported on 8 October 2019 – approved on 6 November 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 - reported on 19 February 2020).
zul: Isivumelwano esasungula i-Square Kilometre Array (SKA) Observatory (Eyathulwamhlaziyi-18 kuMandulo wezi-2019) (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Eyaqondiswa eKomidini LesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezemfundo Ephakeme, iSayensi kanye neZobuchwepheshe mhlazi-19 kuMandulo wezi-2019). (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esidluliselwe eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlazi-19 kuLwezi wezi-2019 2019 – esabikwa mhlaziyi- 8 kuMfumfu wezi-2019 – esemukelwa mhlaziyi-6 kuLwezi wezi-2019) ((UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esidluliselwe eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlaziyi-19 kuLwezi wezi-2019 – esibikwe mhlaziyi-19 kuNhlolanja wezi-2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019).
zul: Isivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika nesikhungo saMazwe Omhlaba esaziwa ngokuthi yi-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) ngokuSungulwa kwengxenye yesikhungo esaziwa ngokuthi i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) eRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika  (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Esindlalelwa iPhalamende mhlaziyi-18 kuMandulo wezi-2019) (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esaqondiswa eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlazi-19 kuMandulo-2019 esabikwa mhlazi-5 kuZibandlela wezi-2019) (UMkandlu kaZwelonke Wezifundazwe: Esidluliselwe eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlaziyi-19 kuLwezi wezi-2019).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
zul: Ukuqiniswa kwesivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNdiya, uhulumeni Wobufederali weRiphabhuliki yaseBrazil kanye noHulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika mayelana neSikhwama se-IBSA Sokwehlisa izinga lobumpofu kanye Nendlala (Esasayindwa mhlazi-17 kuMfumfu wezi-2017) (Esethulwe mhlazi-18 kuMfumfu wezi-2019) (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Okuthunyelwe eKomidini elibhekele Ezobudlelwano Bamazwe Omhlaba Nokubambisana mhlazinga-22 kuMfumfu wezi-2019). (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esaqondiswa eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezokuphepha kanye neZobulungiswa mhlazingama-24 kuMfumfu wezi-2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Extradition (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020).
zul: Isivumelwano phakathi kukaHulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye noHulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseBangladesh mayelana nokuThunyelwa kwabantu abenze  amacala (Esendlalwe mhlazi-14 kuLwezi wezi-2019) (NA: Esithunyelwe eKomidini LeSishayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezobulungiswa kanye Nemisebenzi Yezokuhlunyeleliswa Kwezimilo mhlazi-18 kuLwezi wezi-2019 kwabikwa ngayo mhla zi-3 kuNdasa, wezi-2020) (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esaqondiswa eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezokuphepha kanye neZobulungiswa mhlazingama-30 kuMasingana wezi-2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).

M Waters) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NoKubambisana kanye Nezindaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).

M Waters) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye neziNdaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini wase Kempton Park, ucela isiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke ukuthi siphenye ngokungabonakali kwamaphoyisa agcaluzayo kanye nokungabikhona kwezimoto zamaphoyisa ezanele esiteshini samaphoyisa ase-Kempton Park (Mnu. M Waters) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele eZamaphoyis).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
zul: IZIVUMELWANO ZAMAZWE OMHLABA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019).
zul: Isivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika nesikhungo saMazwe Omhlaba esaziwa ngokuthi yi-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) ngokuSungulwa kwengxenye yesikhungo esaziwa ngokuthi i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) eRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika  (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Esindlalelwa iPhalamende mhlaziyi-18 kuMandulo wezi-2019) (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esaqondiswa eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlazi-18 kuMandulo-2019 esabikwa mhlazi-5 kuZibandlela wezi-2019) egunyazwe mhlazi 10 kuNdasa 2020 (UMkandlu kaZwelonke Wezifundazwe: Esidluliselwe eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlaziyi-19 kuLwezi wezi-2019).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
zul: Ukuqiniswa kwesivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNdiya, uhulumeni Wobufederali weRiphabhuliki yaseBrazil kanye noHulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika mayelana neSikhwama se-IBSA Sokwehlisa izinga lobumpofu kanye Nendlala (Esasayindwa mhlazi-17 kuMfumfu wezi-2017) (Esethulwe mhlazi-18 kuMfumfu wezi-2019) (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Okuthunyelwe eKomidini elibhekele Ezobudlelwano Bamazwe Omhlaba Nokubambisana mhlazinga-22 kuMfumfu wezi-2019). (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esaqondiswa eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezokuphepha kanye neZobulungiswa mhlazingama-24 kuMfumfu wezi-2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Extradition (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020 - approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020 – reported on 17 March 2020).
zul: Isivumelwano phakathi kukaHulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye noHulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseBangladesh mayelana nokuThunyelwa kwabantu abenze  amacala (Esendlalwe mhlazi-14 kuLwezi wezi-2019) (NA: Esithunyelwe eKomidini LeSishayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezobulungiswa kanye Nemisebenzi Yezokuhlunyeleliswa Kwezimilo mhlazi-18 kuLwezi wezi-2019 kwabikwa ngayo mhla zi-3 kuNdasa, wezi-2020 – igunyazwe mhlaka ziyi 10 kuNdasa wezi-2020) (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esaqondiswa eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezokuphepha kanye neZobulungiswa mhlazingama-30 kuMasingana wezi-2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020 - approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020 – reported on 17 March 2020).

eng: APPENDIXES
zul: IZITHASISELO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
zul: IZIKHALAZO EZIBHEKISWE EMAKOMIDINI

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini wase Kempton Park, ucela isiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke ukuthi siphenye ngokungabonakali kwamaphoyisa agcaluzayo kanye nokungabikhona kwezimoto zamaphoyisa ezanele esiteshini samaphoyisa ase-Kempton Park (Mnu. M Waters) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele eZamaphoyisa).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseWattville, eBenoni ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi sikhulume ngobugebengu obudlondlobalayo, kubalwa nodlame oluyamene nobulili kanye nodlame olubhekiswe ezinganeni, kanye nangesidingo sesiteshi samaphoyisa endaweni yawo (uMnu H Ismail) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezamaphoyisa – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini wase-Actonville, eBenoni, ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye izinga eliphakeme lobugebengu nezidakamizwa, nokuthi indawo yawo ihlinzekwe ngomahambanendlwana bamaphoyisa kanye nezimoto zamaphoyisa (Mnu H Ismail) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezamaphoyisa – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini woMasipala Omkhulu wase-Ekurhuleni ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye mayelana nokuthuthwa okungahambi kahle kukadoti okuhlala kwenzeka endaweni yawo (Mnu H Ismail) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye Nezindaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseKokomeng kanye nasezigodini ezingomakhelwane, ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye futhi sibeke phambili ukuvulwa kabusha kwesiteshi samaphoyisa saseKokomeng (Mnu I S Seitlholo) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezamaphoyisa – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
zul: Isikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseBredell, ePomona, Berentwood Park kanye naseGlen Marais (esigcemeni sa-25), iDolobhakazi lase-Ekurhuleni, ucela iSishayamthetho ukuthi siphenye ngokufadabala kokuhlinzekwa okuthembekayo kogesi ezindaweni zawo (Nksz H Ismail) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye neziNdaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini wase-Actonville, eBenoni, ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye izinga eliphakeme lobugebengu nezidakamizwa, nokuthi indawo yawo ihlinzekwe ngomahambanendlwana bamaphoyisa kanye nezimoto zamaphoyisa (Mnu H Ismail) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezamaphoyisa – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
zul: Isivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika nesikhungo saMazwe Omhlaba esaziwa ngokuthi yi-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) ngokuSungulwa kwengxenye yesikhungo esaziwa ngokuthi i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) eRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika  (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Esindlalelwa iPhalamende mhlaziyi-18 kuMandulo wezi-2019) (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esaqondiswa eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlazi-18 kuMandulo-2019 esabikwa mhlazi-5 kuZibandlela wezi-2019) egunyazwe mhlazi 10 kuNdasa 2020 (UMkandlu kaZwelonke Wezifundazwe: Esidluliselwe eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlaziyi-19 kuLwezi wezi-2019– sabikwa mhlazi-26 kuNhlaba wezi-2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
zul: Ukuqiniswa kwesivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNdiya, uhulumeni Wobufederali weRiphabhuliki yaseBrazil kanye noHulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika mayelana neSikhwama se-IBSA Sokwehlisa izinga lobumpofu kanye Nendlala (Esasayindwa mhlazi-17 kuMfumfu wezi-2017) (Esethulwe mhlazi-18 kuMfumfu wezi-2019) (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Okuthunyelwe eKomidini elibhekele Ezobudlelwano Bamazwe Omhlaba Nokubambisana mhlazinga-22 kuMfumfu wezi-2019). (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esaqondiswa eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezokuphepha kanye neZobulungiswa mhlazingama-24 kuMfumfu wezi-2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
zul: Isivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye NoMphakathi WaseYurophu Olawula Ukusetshenziswa Kwamandla Enunzi (i-EURATOM) ukuze kuSetshenziswe Amandla Enunzi Ngokubambisana Okunokuthula (Esendlalwe mhlazi-14 kuLwezi wezi-2019) (Esithunyelwe eKomidini LeSishayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezezimbiwa Nezamandla mhlaziyi-18 kuLwezi wezi-2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).

eng: APPENDIXES
zul: IZITHASISELO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
zul: IZIKHALAZO EZIBHEKISWE EMAKOMIDINI

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini wase Kempton Park, ucela isiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke ukuthi siphenye ngokungabonakali kwamaphoyisa agcaluzayo kanye nokungabikhona kwezimoto zamaphoyisa ezanele esiteshini samaphoyisa ase-Kempton Park (Mnu. M Waters) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele eZamaphoyisa).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseWattville, eBenoni ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi sikhulume ngobugebengu obudlondlobalayo, kubalwa nodlame oluyamene nobulili kanye nodlame olubhekiswe ezinganeni, kanye nangesidingo sesiteshi samaphoyisa endaweni yawo (uMnu H Ismail) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezamaphoyisa – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini wase-Actonville, eBenoni, ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye izinga eliphakeme lobugebengu nezidakamizwa, nokuthi indawo yawo ihlinzekwe ngomahambanendlwana bamaphoyisa kanye nezimoto zamaphoyisa (Mnu H Ismail) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezamaphoyisa – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini woMasipala Omkhulu wase-Ekurhuleni ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye mayelana nokuthuthwa okungahambi kahle kukadoti okuhlala kwenzeka endaweni yawo (Mnu H Ismail) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye Nezindaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseKokomeng kanye nasezigodini ezingomakhelwane, ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye futhi sibeke phambili ukuvulwa kabusha kwesiteshi samaphoyisa saseKokomeng (Mnu I S Seitlholo) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezamaphoyisa – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
zul: Isikhalazo esivela emphakathini waseBredell, ePomona, Berentwood Park kanye naseGlen Marais (esigcemeni sa-25), iDolobhakazi lase-Ekurhuleni, ucela iSishayamthetho ukuthi siphenye ngokufadabala kokuhlinzekwa okuthembekayo kogesi ezindaweni zawo (Nksz H Ismail) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele ezokuBusa NgoKubambisana kanye neziNdaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
zul: Uhlu lwesikhalazo esivela emphakathini wase-Actonville, eBenoni, ucela isiShayamthetho ukuthi siphenye izinga eliphakeme lobugebengu nezidakamizwa, nokuthi indawo yawo ihlinzekwe ngomahambanendlwana bamaphoyisa kanye nezimoto zamaphoyisa (Mnu H Ismail) – (IKomidi leNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezamaphoyisa – iNdlu yesiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke).

zul: Isivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika nesikhungo saMazwe Omhlaba esaziwa ngokuthi yi-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) ngokuSungulwa kwengxenye yesikhungo esaziwa ngokuthi i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) eRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika  (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Esindlalelwa iPhalamende mhlaziyi-18 kuMandulo wezi-2019) (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esaqondiswa eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlazi-18 kuMandulo-2019 esabikwa mhlazi-5 kuZibandlela wezi-2019) egunyazwe mhlazi 10 kuNdasa 2020 (UMkandlu kaZwelonke Wezifundazwe: Esidluliselwe eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlaziyi-19 kuLwezi wezi-2019– sabikwa mhlazi-26 kuNhlaba wezi-2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
zul: Ukuqiniswa kwesivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNdiya, uhulumeni Wobufederali weRiphabhuliki yaseBrazil kanye noHulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika mayelana neSikhwama se-IBSA Sokwehlisa izinga lobumpofu kanye Nendlala (Esasayindwa mhlazi-17 kuMfumfu wezi-2017) (Esethulwe mhlazi-18 kuMfumfu wezi-2019) (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Okuthunyelwe eKomidini elibhekele Ezobudlelwano Bamazwe Omhlaba Nokubambisana mhlazinga-22 kuMfumfu wezi-2019). (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esaqondiswa eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezokuphepha kanye neZobulungiswa mhlazingama-24 kuMfumfu wezi-2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
zul: Isivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye NoMphakathi WaseYurophu Olawula Ukusetshenziswa Kwamandla Enunzi (i-EURATOM) ukuze kuSetshenziswe Amandla Enunzi Ngokubambisana Okunokuthula (Esendlalwe mhlazi-14 kuLwezi wezi-2019) (Esithunyelwe eKomidini LeSishayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezezimbiwa Nezamandla mhlaziyi-18 kuLwezi wezi-2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
zul: Isivumelwano phakathi kukaHulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye noHulumeni weRiphabhuliki yase United Mexican States mayelana nezokuBambisana kwezosizo lwezoMthetho emaCaleni obuGebengu (Esendlalwe mhla zi-5 kuNdasa wezi-2020). (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke: Sadluliselwa eKomidini loMkhandlu kaZwelonke weziFundazwe elibhekele ezokuPhepha nobuLungiswa mhla ziyi-10 kuNdasa wezi-2020 – sabikwa mhlalu-1 kuNhlangulana wezi-2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 202 0– approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
zul: Isivumelwano phakathi kukaHulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye noHulumeni weRiphabhuliki yase United Mexican States mayelana nokubuyiselwa kwabanamacala ezweni labo (Esendlalwe mhla zi-5 kuNdasa wezi-2020) (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke: Sadluliselwa eKomidini loMkhandlu WeziFundazwe elibhekele EzokuPhepha NezobuLungiswa mhla ziyi-10 kuNdasa wezi-2020– sabikwa mhlalu-1 kuNhlangulana wezi-2020).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
zul: I-Charter YaseAfrika YeziBalo (Esendlalwe mhla zi-5 kuNdasa wezi-2020) (IsiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke: Sadluliselwa eKomidini loMkhandlu WeziFundazwe elibhekele Izisebenzi ZikaHulumeni NezokuPhatha mhlazi-9 kuNdasa wezi-2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020).
zul: ISivumelwano Sobuhlobo kanye Nokubambisana eNingizimu Ntshonalanga ye-Asia (i-TAC) (Esendlalwe mhla zi-18 kuNdasa wezi-2020) (IsiShayamthetho sikaZwelonke: yadliliselwa eKomidini LezoBudlelwano kanye NokuBambisana Namazwe mhla zi-26 kuNdasa wezi-2020).

eng: MOTIONS:
zul: IZIPHAKAMISO:

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House –
zul: Isinqumo somhlangano sesikhashana (USotswebhu Omkhulu weQembu Elibusayo): Ukuthi iNdlu –

eng: notes that the term of office of the Auditor-General is due to end on 30 November 2020;
zul: iqaphele ukuthi isikhathi sokusebenza koMcwaningi-Mabhuku Jikelele sizophela ekupheleni kukaLwezi wezi-2020 mhlazi-30;

eng: establishes in terms of Rule 253(1)(a) an ad hoc committee on the appointment of the Auditor-General, the Committee to –
zul: isungule ikomidi lesikhashana lokuqokwa koMcwaningi-Mabhuku Jikelele ngokulandela uMthetho WeNdlu 253(1)(a), le Komidi li- –

eng: nominates a person in terms of section 193 of the Constitution for appointment as Auditor-General;
zul: zoqoka umuntu ngokulandela isigaba se-193 soMthethosisekelo sokuqashwa koMcwaningi-Mabhuku Jikelele;

eng: consist of 11 members of the National Assembly, as follows: ANC 6, DA 2, EFF 1, and other parties 2;
zul: zobanamalungu ayi-11 eSishayamthetho Sikazwelonke, ame kanje: awe-ANC ayi-6, awe-DA ma-2, li-1 ele-EFF, kanti ma-2 awamanye amaqembu;

eng: exercise those powers in Rule 167 necessary to assist it in carrying out its task; and
zul: zosebenzisa lawo mandla eMthethweni WeNdlu we-167 okudingeka ukuze ulilekelele ekwenzeni umsebenzi walo; kanye

eng: report to the House on the nomination of the Auditor-General by 31 August 2020.
zul: nokubikela iNdlu ngokuqokwa koMphenyimabhuku Omkhulu mhla zi-31 kuNcwaba wezi-2020.

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House, notwithstanding Rule 138(2), which provides for rotation of clusters for Questions to Ministers on a weekly basis as determined by the Rules Committee, mandates the National Assembly Programme Committee to make decisions regarding the combination of clusters of government portfolios and the rotation of clusters based on the determination of priorities as and when necessary for the duration of the 2020 annual session.
zul: Isinqumo somhlangano sesikhashana (USotswebhu Omkhulu weQembu Elibusayo): Ukuthi iNdlu, kubukwa uMthetho WeNdlu we-138(2), ohlinzeka ngokushintshana kwamaqoqo eminyango kweMibuzo koNgqongqoshe masonto onke njengokubalulwa iKomidi LeMthetho YeNdlu, ligunyaza iKomidi LeZinhlelo LeSishayamthetho Sikazwelonke ukwenza izinqumo mayelana nokuhlanganiswa kwamaqoqo eminyango kahulumeni kanye nokushintshana  kwamaqoqo eminyango mayelana nokubalulwa kokuzokwenziwa ngesikhathi okufabnele kwenziwe ngaso esikhathini sokuhlala kwaminyakayonke ngowezi-2020.

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
zul: Isivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika nesikhungo saMazwe Omhlaba esaziwa ngokuthi yi-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) ngokuSungulwa kwengxenye yesikhungo esaziwa ngokuthi i-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) eRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika  (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Esindlalelwa iPhalamende mhlaziyi-18 kuMandulo wezi-2019) (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esaqondiswa eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlazi-18 kuMandulo-2019 esabikwa mhlazi-5 kuZibandlela wezi-2019) egunyazwe mhlazi 10 kuNdasa 2020 (UMkandlu kaZwelonke Wezifundazwe: Esidluliselwe eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezemfundo, Ezobuchwepheshe, Ezemidlalo, EzobuCiko, kanye NamaSiko mhlaziyi-19 kuLwezi wezi-2019).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
zul: Ukuqiniswa kwesivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNdiya, uhulumeni Wobufederali weRiphabhuliki yaseBrazil kanye noHulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika mayelana neSikhwama se-IBSA Sokwehlisa izinga lobumpofu kanye Nendlala (Esasayindwa mhlazi-17 kuMfumfu wezi-2017) (Esethulwe mhlazi-18 kuMfumfu wezi-2019) (ISishayamthetho Sikazwelonke: Okuthunyelwe eKomidini elibhekele Ezobudlelwano Bamazwe Omhlaba Nokubambisana mhlazinga-22 kuMfumfu wezi-2019). (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esaqondiswa eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezokuphepha kanye neZobulungiswa mhlazingama-24 kuMfumfu wezi-2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Extradition (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020 - approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020 – reported on 17 March 2020).
zul: Isivumelwano phakathi kukaHulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye noHulumeni weRiphabhuliki yaseBangladesh mayelana nokuThunyelwa kwabantu abenze  amacala (Esendlalwe mhlazi-14 kuLwezi wezi-2019) (NA: Esithunyelwe eKomidini LeSishayamthetho sikaZwelonke elibhekele Ezobulungiswa kanye Nemisebenzi Yezokuhlunyeleliswa Kwezimilo mhlazi-18 kuLwezi wezi-2019 kwabikwa ngayo mhla zi-3 kuNdasa, wezi-2020 – igunyazwe mhlaka ziyi 10 kuNdasa wezi-2020) (UMkhandlu kaZwelonke WeziFundazwe: Esaqondiswa eKomidini loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe elibhekele Ezokuphepha kanye neZobulungiswa mhlazingama-30 kuMasingana wezi-2020).
